mapper.insert: insert into mail(mail_no, title, mail_content, rec_mail, send_mail, send_date, del_check) values(mail_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{mail_content}, #{rec_mail}, #{send_mail}, to_char(sysdate, 'YY-MM-dd'), '0')

insert into mail(mail_no, sign, title, mail_content, file_name, emp_no, send_date, rec_name, rec_mail, rec_date, rec_check, del_check, rec_del_check) values(mail_seq.nextval, '0', #{title}, #{mail_content}, #{file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_no}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{rec_name}, #{rec_mail}, null, '0', '0', '0')
mapper.select: select mail_no, sign, title, mail_content, file_name, emp_no, send_date, rec_name, rec_mail, rec_date, rec_check from mail where mail_no = #{mail_no}

select r.mail_no, r.sign, r.title, r.file_name, r.emp_no, r.send_date, e.emp_name from ( select mail_no, sign, title, file_name, emp_no, send_date from mail where rec_mail = #{rec_mail} and rec_del_check = '0' ) r join emp e on r.emp_no=e.emp_no
select title, mail_content, rec_mail, send_mail, send_date, del_check from mail where send_mail = #{email} and del_check = '0'
select mail_no, title, file_name, emp_no, send_date from mail where rec_del_check = '1'
